strapiPost.title: Thanksgiving Safety Tips
strapiPost.content:
Arkansas Center for Health Improvement is provided recommendations for Thanksgiving gatherings

  • Info - ACHI strongly recommends that family's forgo gathering outside of the core household. If you do meet with extended families, the ACHI recommends eating outside, wearing a mask when appropriate, and under a limited time frame. Gatherings should be limited to 10 or less if possible.
  • If you plan on traveling out of the state, try getting a rapid test before leaving and once you return back into the state.
